ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringinvval.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |

| 5 |  | ringinvval.u | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |

| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- U e. _V |

| 17 | 16 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U ) -> ( N ` X ) = ( iota_ y e. U ( y .* X ) = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) ) ) |

| 21 | 20 | #P_riotabidva | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( iota_ y e. U ( y .* X ) = .1. ) = ( iota_ y e. U ( y .* X ) = ( 0g ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) ) ) |
